contest-event.event-date:
June 1, 1903 D West Stanley Contest (Open Section)
West Stanley Contest (Open Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Stanley Contest west-stanley-contest-open-section
Test Piece Contest
Mercadante
West Stanley, County Durham Prizes - 1st £30, 2nd £20, 3rd £15, 4th £10, 5th £5. March contest - 1st(£3) and 2nd(£1.10s.) divided between Wyke and Murton Colliery. 3rd(10s.) divided between Spencer's Steelworks, West Pelton and Backworth. 15th annual contest 10 bands competed.
June 12, 2013, 10:28 p.m. July 28, 2018, 12:32 p.m.
1 Wyke Edwin Swift
2 Heworth Colliery Band William Heap
3 Murton Colliery Band Angus Holden
4 Hebburn Colliery William Heap
5 Backworth Colliery Band Angus Holden
Unknown Result West Pelton Volunteers William Heap
Unknown Result Spencer's Steelworks Prize Band T. Valentine
Unknown Result South Derwent R. Cooper
Unknown Result Rise Carr W. H. Crowther
Unknown Result Brandon Colliery G. Bowes
